subsection-1.heading: What you get with the Ri 1000 DTG printer package
subsection-1.subheading: The Ri 1000 DTG printer package comes with everything you'll need to print vivid garments in no </br> time, including a heat press, with low monthly payments and 0% financing!

subsection-2.heading: Ricoma Training Academy
subsection-2.paragraph: Included in your package is Ricoma's legendary training and support. You'll leave Ricoma's training academy with the know-how and confidence you'll need to begin printing quality garments in no time!
